body: I dunno. I used ShadowExplorer to get an earlier version of the file, so at least the file appears in the game but when I get in it it's only ocean. The entire base was made with WorldPainter so it's like nothing got built.
body_html: I dunno. I used ShadowExplorer to get an earlier version of the file, so at least the file appears in the game but when I get in it it's only ocean. The entire base was made with WorldPainter so it's like nothing got built.

body: Try putting a copy of the original corrupted save back in your saves folder, move its level.dat and level.bak etc to a different location, and then re-create the world with the same name. It won't preserve the seed but the original chunks will still be there.
body_html: Try putting a copy of the original corrupted save back in your saves folder, move its level.dat and level.bak etc to a different location, and then re-create the world with the same name. It won't preserve the seed but the original chunks will still be there.

body: Make sure *not* to remove region or any mca files. Only level.* files.
